summary: Implements a file-based logging sink that manages writing log records to disk, handling directory creation, file opening/closing, and applying policies such as log rotation, compression, and retention. Includes utilities for date-based filename formatting, compression handling, and schedule calculations for rotation intervals.
business_intent: Provide applications with an automated, configurable mechanism for managing log files on disk, ensuring logs are rotated, optionally compressed, and retained according to defined policies to prevent uncontrolled growth and simplify log maintenance.
